Summary: It was hovering over the mountain, dipping above and below the mountainline.
divs: sighting detailsi have seen this same amber\orangish light on 5 occasions. the first two times, i thought it was a star or planet because it would appear in the same area in the sky. on the fourth occasion (about two days before the event i am now recording) i saw it in the sky and stopped my car because it looked like it got brighter, i watched it then start moving across the sky, it flew over head of me and a friend while in the car, but it was very far away so we could not make out any sounds. and by the time we got out of the treeline (about 15 seconds) it was already across the valley and out of sight (it was not heading toward hazleton airport) after this event i was sure it was not a star or planet since there is no celestial body i know which would move or leave its station in the sky. on the fourth occasion (this one) i watched it with two friends, it was over the mountain where berwick power plant is, but i believe because it was far away that is where i was able to see it. after about an hour and a half of moving around in the same general area slowly, it started dissapearing behind the mountain. an hour after it disapeared i watch an amber\orangish sphere (same color as all of the other times) appear, it seemed to drop out of the clouds but that night was fairly clear, it flew across the sky, we watched until we couldnt see it any longer. i am sure i will probably see it again, as i have seen it on other occasions too.
